comprehensive overview: HEASoft (High Energy Astrophysics Software) is a software suite developed by NASA's High Energy Astrophysics Science Archive Research Center (HEASARC) for analyzing and processing data from high-energy astrophysics missions like Chandra and XMM-Newton.
core features: Data analysis and processing tools for high-energy astrophysics data
Support for data reduction, modeling, and visualization
Integration with missions like Chandra and XMM-Newton
